actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Center for Bioengineering Research.
short_title: National Center for Bioengineering Research Act
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: National Center for Bioengineering Research Act - Establishes a National Center for Bioengineering Research within the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute to: (1) promote basic research in bioengineering; and (2) establish an office to enhance and improve coordination of bioengineering research conducted within the National Institutes of Health and throughout the Federal Government. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: National Center for Bioengineering Research Act
A bill to amend title IV of the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Center for Bioengineering Research.
